request.description: Gain access to the application
Send user an email with a link to change password in the event user forgot password or needs to change password
Refresh the bearer token when user is logged in and token is about to expire
Voluntatirly end access to the application

This resource will return a collection of the available currencies.
Get the id from the selected resource and use it as currency_id when creating customer.
Each customer is assumed to transact(send) money using his/her selected curreny.
However, one can receive money in other currencies part from his/her selected curreny.
In transactions, use currency from the sender while displaying the record
This resource will return a collection of the customers.

Select a customer using the id. If the customer exists, the response containes customer data.
Otherwise, return a not found error response.

Update an existing customer. Pick the data based on selected fields stored in the database. Select the status id from customer status, group id from customer group and currency id from a resource in currency collection.
The currency wille be referenced when the user transacts. That is, the currency show for each transaction.
Provide the id of the customer in the case of deleting the customer. No recovery of data once deleted.

A customer can exist in different states at different times depending on their activities in the application.
This resource will return a collection of the possible states.
This resource will return a collection of the different groups of customers.
This resource will return a collection of the transactions.

Select a transaction using the id. If the transaction exists, the response containes transaction data.
Otherwise, return a not found error response.
Provide the id of the transaction in the case of deleting the transaction. No recovery of deleted data. The action is permanent.

A transaction can be a success, pending or failed. This resource returns the data for each state/status.
By default each transaction has a pending status as it waiting to be processed. The admin will change state to success or failed.

A transaction can be classified into different types. The type is declared when creating the transaction.
It is advisable to pick this field using radio buttons on the transaction form to pick the appropriate type.
This resource gives the data for each type. Use the resource id as the type_id creating a transaction.

A transaction can use various methods such as debit card, mobile app or cash. Each resource has method data.
Pass the id of resource as method_id when creating a new transaction.
Verify the reset password token
Select a new user password
Get authenticated user profile
User can edit the profile data
Switch the emailss to make the other email a primary. The current primary email will be set to false.
Select user email addresses
Create a new user email address
Update a user email address
Remove a user email address
Switch the numbers to make the other number a primary. The current primary phone number will be set to false.
Select user phone numbers
Create a new user phone number
Update a user phone number
Remove a user phone number
Select all the genders
